sqlMap.select: SELECT A.YEAR , B.METRIC_ID , B.METRIC_NM , B.SC_DEPT_ID , C.SC_DEPT_NM , B.INSERT_USER_ID , E.USER_NM , B.METRIC_PROPERTY_ID , F_CODE_NM('010', B.METRIC_PROPERTY_ID, A.YEAR) AS METRIC_PROPERTY_NM , B.TYPE_ID , F_CODE_NM('007', B.METRIC_PROPERTY_ID, A.YEAR) AS TYPE_NM , TO_CHAR(D.TARGET) AS TARGET , TO_CHAR(D.ACTUAL) AS ACTUAL , TO_CHAR(D.SCORE) AS SCORE , D.STATUS FROM STR_METRIC_MAPPING A INNER JOIN BSC_METRIC B ON A.YEAR = B.YEAR AND A.METRIC_ID = B.METRIC_ID AND B.DELETE_DT IS NULL INNER JOIN BSC_SC_DEPT C ON B.YEAR = C.YEAR AND B.SC_DEPT_ID = C.SC_DEPT_ID AND C.DELETE_DT IS NULL LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_METRICSCORE D ON B.YEAR = D.YEAR AND D.MON = #findMon# AND B.METRIC_ID = D.METRIC_ID AND D.ANAL_CYCLE = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN V_ROLE_USER E ON B.INSERT_USER_ID = E.USER_ID WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear# AND A.SUBJECT_METRIC_ID = #findSubjectMetricId# ORDER BY C.SORT_ORDER, B.SORT_ORDER
SELECT SUBJECT_METRIC_NM FROM STR_METRIC WHERE YEAR = #findYear# AND SUBJECT_METRIC_ID = #findSubjectMetricId#
